vikings.name: Ragnar Lothbrok
vikings.description: Fearless Viking leader with unmatched strategic prowess.

vikings.name: Lagertha
vikings.description: Fierce shieldmaiden skilled in combat and renowned for her bravery.

vikings.name: Floki
vikings.description: Innovative shipbuilder and eccentric Norseman known for his loyalty.

vikings.name: Bjorn Ironside
vikings.description: Son of Ragnar Lothbrok, a relentless warrior seeking new adventures.

vikings.name: Ivar the Boneless
vikings.description: Strategic and cunning Viking tactician, despite physical challenges.
